response.overview: A romantic Lebanese comedy that follows Lana as she unexpectedly reconnects with her ex at his wedding, only to find herself pretending to be in a relationship with a mysterious stranger. What begins as a harmless arrangement quickly turns into an emotional journey filled with humor, awkward encounters, and unexpected feelings. The film explores love, pride, and second chances within a contemporary Lebanese setting.
response.tagline: Sometimes the best love story starts with a lie.
response.title: Liste de mariage

cast.name: Carlos Azar , Rita Hayek , Samara Nohra
cast.original_name: Carlos Azar , Rita Hayek , Samara Nohra
